/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Among these structures, a large white building with a curved roof stands out, its modern design contrasting with the traditional architecture of the surrounding buildings.

Cars and pedestrians can be seen sharing the road, adding life and movement to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
